text: Lara Jill Miller (born April 20, 1967) is an American actress. She played Samantha "Sam" Kanisky on the 1980s sitcom Gimme a Break! and Kathy on The Amanda Show. ==Filmography== ===Live-action=== List of acting performances in live-action television and film Year Title Role Notes Source 1981–1987 Gimme a Break!
